verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [V: refused] [ARG1: to sign a joint statement negotiated during the Group of 7 summit meeting] , [ARGM-ADV: saying on Twitter that Prime Minister Justin Trudeau of Canada was “ very dishonest and weak] . ”
